'''Celeborn''' was the name of the '''White Tree''' that flourished in [[Tol Eressëa]]. It was a seedling of the tree [[Galathilion]], which in turn had been made in image of [[Telperion]], the eldest of the [[Two Trees of Valinor]].<ref>{{S|Princes}}</ref>

Celeborn was an ancestor to [[Nimloth of Númenor]]<ref>{{S|Akallabeth}}</ref> which is in turn ancestor to the [[White Tree of Gondor|White Trees of Gondor]].<ref>{{FR|II2}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''[[Celeb]]'' is Sindarin for "silver", while ''[[orn]]'' is "tree"; its name means "Tree of Silver".<ref>{{S|Index}}</ref><ref>{{S|Appendix}}</ref>
